item.description:
Please join us for a potluck dinner, a short planning meeting to put together our calendar of upcoming events, and a board games night  at Gloria's home in Windsor.  When you RSVP, let us know what you can contribute to the dinner to help round out the menu.

No need to come to the Scholarship Committee meeting first (though you are welcome) -- just join us for the fun stuff.

Because this event is in a private home, you must RSVP to get address and directions.
item.why: We need to have a little fun following the scholarship committee meeting!
item.name: Potluck dinner and games night
